name: Lands of Vodria
description:
Climb the throne in Lands of Vodria

tactic

Fight in tactical card battles against different opponents on a changing battlefield.
Sometimes even sacrificing some units to achieve victory can be helpful

Strategy

But wars are not only won in battles. Plan a long-term strategy to conquer the land.
Strengthen your army step by step and master the battlefield. Gather experience and use it wisely.
Whether you're spying on your opponent's cards or tweaking army upgrades, there are many ways to conquer Vodria.
Raid the cities for gold to improve yourself or conquer directly.
But stay alerted, your enemies will rally and throw you back.

Can you overcome them and take the throne?
